channel.title: rmascarenhas.com
channel.description: How to write software which is bad, slow and still expensive

item.title: Unix domain sockets in Ruby
item.author: renato.mascosta@gmail.com (Renato Mascarenhas)
item.description: Unix is cool. So is Ruby. So why bother? Well, turns out when you mix two cool things, they get cooler than the sum of the coolness of each individually!
